cards.name: Beric Dondarrion
cards.text: Renown. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Beric Dondarrion is attacking, choose a character controlled by the losing opponent. Until the end of the round, that character cannot kneel or stand. (Limit once per round.)

cards.name: Lady Marya
cards.text: You may marshal or play facedown cards attached to Lady Marya as if they were in your hand. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control an attacking Captain or Smuggler character, kneel Lady Marya to attach the top card of the losing opponent's deck to Lady Marya facedown under your control, as an attachment with the text: "Location only. Terminal."

cards.name: Victarion Greyjoy
cards.text: Reaction: After a phase begins, kneel a character you control. If it has the: - R’hllor trait, Victarion Greyjoy gains insight and "immune to opponents' character abilities" until the end of the phase. - Drowned God trait, Victarion Greyjoy gains renown and cannot be killed until the end of the phase.

cards.name: Cast Me Forth
cards.text: You may ambush non-unique Drowned God characters from your dead pile as if they were in your hand. Each Drowned God character in your hand or dead pile gains ambush (X). X is that card's printed cost.
cards.flavor: "When he cast me forth again he gave me eyes to see, ears to hear, and a voice to spread his word, that I might be his prophet and teach his truth to those who have forgotten." <cite>Aeron Damphair</cite>

cards.name: Myrcella Baratheon
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Myrcella Baratheon is participating, return her to your hand. Then, you may initiate an additional [intrigue] challenge against the losing opponent this phase. (Max once per phase.)

cards.name: Castamere
cards.text: Reaction: After claim is applied for an [intrigue] challenge you won by 5 or more STR, kneel and sacrifice Castamere to apply [military] claim.
cards.flavor: "They are well aware of Castamere, I promise you." <cite>Tywin Lannister</cite>

cards.name: Scheming Snake
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Scheming Snake enters play during a challenge, choose a participating character with fewer than 2 challenge icons. That character does not contribute its STR to this challenge.

cards.name: A Bed of Scorpions
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge, choose and kill a participating character. (Max 1 per challenge.)
cards.flavor: Lord Tyrell and his train traveled to Sandstone, where his lordship was murdered in a bed of scorpions.

cards.name: Gared
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Interrupt: When an Omen plot card is revealed, kneel each opponent's faction card.
cards.flavor: “Everyone talks about snows forty foot deep, and how the ice wind comes howling out of the north, but the real enemy is the cold.”

cards.name: Sentinel Stand
cards.text: While Sentinel Stand is standing, each character you control with 1 or fewer challenge icons gets +2 STR.
cards.flavor: The other keeps, long deserted, were lonely, haunted places, where cold winds whistled through black windows and the spirits of the dead manned the parapets.

cards.name: Karstark Lancer
cards.text: Interrupt: When Karstark Lancer is sacrificed or killed, each player chooses a location they control, if able. Each of those locations gains 1 power.
cards.flavor: "Rickard Karstark killed more than a Frey and a Lannister. He killed my honor." <cite>Robb Stark</cite>

cards.name: Lonely Hills
cards.text: While Lonely Hills is standing, you are considered to have 1 fewer plot card in your used pile.
cards.flavor: "Those are Umber lands, where they know every tree and every rock." <cite>Jon Snow</cite>

cards.name: Free Brothers
cards.text: Reaction: After Free Brothers enters play, search your deck for an Ally character with printed cost 3 or lower and place it in your discard pile. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Dance of the Dragons
cards.text: Interrupt: When claim is applied for a [military] or [intrigue] challenge in which you are the attacking player, instead of the normal claim effects, kneel a Dragon character to move 2 power from the losing opponent's faction card to your own.

cards.name: Red-Apple Knight
cards.text: While you control exactly 1 unique [tyrell] Knight character, Red-Apple Knight gets +X STR. X is that character's STR.

cards.name: Highgarden Treasury
cards.text: Reaction: After a character is removed from a challenge, gain 1 gold. (Limit 3 times per round.)
cards.flavor: The wealth and power of Highgarden could have made all the difference in the fighting yet to come.

cards.name: Bloodraven
cards.text: Insight. No attachments except Old Gods. Reaction: After the plot phase begins, sacrifice Bloodraven to choose an opponent. You may look at that player's chosen plot card before you choose a plot card to reveal this phase.
cards.designer: Card design by 2022 Online World Champion, Alexandre Carry.

cards.name: Calm as Still Water
cards.text: Interrupt: When a character with printed cost 3 or lower would be killed, save it and return it to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: Arya took a breath to still her soul.

cards.name: At the Tower of Joy
cards.text: When Revealed: Choose a character. Until you reveal a new plot card, that character cannot be killed.
cards.flavor: It was said that Rhaegar had named that place the tower of joy, but for Ned it was a bitter memory.

cards.name: Open Revolt
cards.text: Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, if you have not lost an [intrigue] challenge this phase, gain 2 power for your faction. (4 power instead if you have 3 or more Scheme plot cards removed from the game.)
